div.p: HI I’M BILL O’REILLY, THANKS FOR WATCHING US TONIGHT.

TAXPAYERS SHOULD FUND ABORTIONS.
RUTH BADER GINSBURG, ELENA KAGAN, SOTOMAYOR AND STEPHAN
BRIAR VOTED TO UPHOLD THE MANDATE.
THAT’S HARD TO BELIEVE BECAUSE RELIGIOUS FREEDOM IS
THE MALL MARK OF THE CONSTITUTION.
IF YOU SINCERELY BELIEVE THAT ABORTION IS MORALLY
WRONG YOU HAVE THE THE ABILITY TO OPT OUT.
THESE FOUR JUSTICES WOULD DENY YOU THAT RIGHT.
ABSOLUTELY CONTRADICTING THE CONSTITUTION.
AGAIN, THAT’S FRIGHTENING. THE OTHER MATTER DECIDED

AGAIN IT WAS A-4. LIBERAL JUSTICES BELIEVING

MOST AMERICANS DO NOT UNDERSTAND THAT AT ALL.
